alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 2:58PM EDT until April 25 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Western Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 258 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highland Hills, or 12 miles east of Cleveland, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Geneva, South Russell, Madison, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Perry and Orwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
